attributes.action: Build a General Hospital for the residence of West Wiltshire.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Patients in W Wilts requiring hospital treatment have three alternatives, RUH at Bath, Salisbury and Swindon. All of these Hospitals are from 27,48, and 92 miles round trip from where I live. We need a Hospital in W. Wiltshire.
